Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

Namaskar. Thank you for participating in the Isha Upa Yoga Session.

We hope you are enjoying your yoga practices. Even a few minutes a day can go a long way in enhancing your experience of life, your health and vitality. We're happy to share with you a message from Sadhguru as you begin your journey:

Allow these simple tools of Upa Yoga to enhance your life and serve as a stepping stone for a higher possibility. Once an individual gets a taste of yoga, the longing to share it with others naturally arises. Of the many ways a human being can contribute and serve other human beings, to offer a spiritual possibility that leads to ultimate wellbeing is the greatest gift.

- Sadhguru

For any questions you may have about the practices, feel free to write to australia@ishafoundation.org

We look forward to you joining us on a life-transforming journey on the path of Yoga!
